ygData.subject: Re: Kelin's Lament
ygData.msgSnippet: That means you can buy exactly ONE copy of the spell (the original question was - can one take extra copIES to Freeport to sell)... Slyde of Xegony (Lvl 10)
ygData.messageBody:
That means you can buy exactly ONE copy of the spell (the original question
was - can one take extra copIES to Freeport to sell)...

Slyde of Xegony (Lvl 10)
----- Original Message -----
From: Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn <ReeceT@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 8:29 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kelin's Lament


> From: "Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn" <ReeceT@...>
>
> So are you saying if I buy a song that is only available in Kelethin and
> then go to Freeport and attempt to sell or give it to someone I will not
be
> able to trade it to them because it is a lore item?
>
> Galtin
> E'ci
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Kyle [SMTP:ksibbald@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 12:55 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kelin's Lament
> >
> > From: "Kyle" <ksibbald@...>
> >
> > You won't be able to do that. Our songs are now a lore item. This
> > means
> > that you can only have one in your possession (that includes the bank)
at
> > any one time and you cannot trade or drop the item.
> >
> > Tried it before they were marked as lore items. Lost 5 plat cause of
> > it on
> > that very song doing that very thing.
> >
> > Good Journey,
> >
> > Sineras (Cazic-Thule)
> >
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 1:10 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kelin's Lament
> >
> >
> > From: John Kim <kim@...>
> >
> > On what server do you need Kelin's Lament? I'm on Karana and
> > was planning to make the trip from Kelethin to Qeynos some
> > time this week. I could buy a couple extra copies and sell
> > them there.
> >
> > --
> > John H. Kim
> > kim@...
> >
